articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘ACC president Jay Shah…’: PCB reacts after Asia Cup hybrid model gets approved - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Asia Cup: The two likely India-Pakistan matches - both will qualify to clash in the next round if they beat Nepal - and the final will be played in Sri Lanka. | Cricket
articles.content: After BCCIs refusal to play Asia Cup 2023 in Pakistan, the PCB had been pushing for the hybrid model, where they get to host at least the non-India matches of the tournaments initial round. After mon… [+3232 chars]
